name: Plaso-Connect
shortDescription: Plaso Connect is an application which acts as a one-stop solution where the people requiring blood plasma/oxygen can directly find and contact the donors and healthcare units as per their requirements. It also has dashboard for showing live Covid stats.
longDescription: Plaso Connect is an application which acts as a one-stop solution where the people requiring blood plasma/oxygen can directly find and contact the donors and healthcare units as per their requirements. It also has dashboard for showing live Covid stats.
